entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 09:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning and afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
